free.question: Is it really free?
free.answer: Yes! You can create trips completely free. We offer premium features for power users, but the core trip planning is always free.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the itineraries?
accuracy.answer: Our AI uses real-time data from Google Places, verified opening hours, and optimized routing to ensure accuracy. We continuously update our recommendations.

customize.question: Can I customize the itinerary?
customize.answer: Absolutely! You can regenerate specific activities, adjust timing, add your own stops, and share with travel companions who can vote on activities.

destinations.question: What destinations do you support?
destinations.answer: We support any city in the world that Google Maps covers. From major cities like Paris and Tokyo to smaller towns and hidden gems.

save.question: Can I save my trips?
save.answer: Yes! Create a free account to save unlimited trips, access them from any device, and share with friends.

collaborate.question: Can I plan with friends?
collaborate.answer: Yes! Invite travel companions to collaborate on your trip. They can view the itinerary, vote on activities, and suggest new ones.
